attributes.action: Reduce the volume of legislation presented to Parliament and improve its quality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament is asked to deal with too much legislation and too much of it is badly thought out so that it is constantly amended during its passage and subsequently in orders and amending acts. The country would be better governed if there was less legislation and Parliament put more time into scrutinising the Government more effectively
